profile:
The Anything Guys was founded in 2005 by Tom Rheaume. It has since grown to a strong 10 person team. 
 
Our focus is to supply Ottawa residents with a professional, affordable service that is a one-stop shop for both commercial and residential clients, specializing in pretty much anything! We pride ourselves in our ability to offer a large variety of different household and property related services, big or small, irregular or mainstream, which can be found on our services page. 

This is what you receive with every job you book with us: 
 
Convenience: One number, one main contact and an experienced team to handle most any home and garden renovation and maintenance need. 

Quality Work: Qualified tradesmen who will do the work diligently and to the highest standards
Reliability & Consistency: Good communication is very important to us. If a customer changes the scope of work, we notify them of changes to timelines, schedules and budgets. 

Customer Service: Enjoy a positive experience working with TAG.  

Fair pricing that comes with full Insurance: Our pricing is competitive and we are fully insurued which means you aren't at risk when hiring us for your renovation or landscaping work.
name: The Anything Guys

profile:
My name is Abe, owner at Arama Renos. I've worked as a construction worker with a construction company in Toronto for a few years, it was exciting and helped me establish a clear vision of where I was headed. I then took an amazing job as a warranty Technician with a local builder in Ottawa for some time, then 2019 came and I thought it was time to start my own Home Reno business which was my dream. We opened our doors in 2019 and it has been amazing ever since. We pride ourselves in what we do, our vision is to provide quality work combined with a strong customer service experience, we care about our customers and want to build a long-term relationship with them, a happy homeowner is what keeps us going!

At Arama Renos, we don't rush the work, we make sure to do it right and never cut corners".
services: Home Additions, Multiple Room renovations, Bathroom, Basement , Garage and Kitchen renovations, Framing
payment_method: Whatever is in the customer's convenience

profile:
Founded in 2018, GrandCor is a construction project management company featuring a management team with over 20 years of experience providing bespoke, cradle-to-grave construction and building solutions as well as property management for a diverse range of commercial, retail and public sector clients across Canada. 
.
GrandCor embraces complexity across the project lifecycle and differentiates itself as an organization through an unapologetic focus on execution for the exclusive benefit of our clients. GrandCor's defining qualities as a leader in construction project management include: 

  • Transparency and client-focus ‒ Providing our clients with best-in-class service and outcomes is driven by our transparent approach to client engagement where we “do what we say and say what we do.” Anything less is unacceptable. 
  • An established track record ‒ GrandCor has an established track record of performance in providing tailored construction and building service solutions and project management engagements for diverse clients across their entire project lifecycle. 
  • A forward-thinking approach ‒ GrandCor’s key differentiating feature is its forward-thinking approach to its operations, implementing cutting edge technology, design trends and development techniques. We provide the most creative solutions for the unique specifications of each client. 
  • An experienced team ‒ GrandCor’s management team features over 20 years of comprehensive construction project management experience across Canada, with deep exposure to the full project construction lifecycle. We have encountered a complex range of commercial and residential projects of varying stage, scale and performance 
.
The GrandCor team looks forward to addressing your specific project-based needs and exceeding your expectations on-time and on-budget. We have a broad range of client references available upon request. In addition, we offer first-time client incentives in and no-obligation estimates. 
.
For more information and a comprehensive overview of our capabilities and projects, please contact us at info@GrandCor.ca and visit our website: http://www.GrandCor.ca
